thread.section_title: Fundbox Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fundbox | fundbox.com
thread.title: NoctisIT, LLC.

author: NoctisIT, LLC.
title: NoctisIT, LLC.
text:
Fundbox has become an indispensable tool in my arsenal ensuring I keep my comparative advantage. The services available often allow me to act as if I'm a larger company than I am and to provide additional, just in time, services to my clients by having capital available to make purchases I then resell to my clients with great margin potential. In addition, there are times when I need capital to use 1099 resources for projects which pay after completion and Fundbox gives me the ability to do this as well.
Besides the great service and super easy to understand website, their prices are very fair and put fort in a straightforward manner so you know exactly what the service will cost your business.
In the world of highly competitive and commodity based IT services, being able to move nimbly with Fundbox in my toolkit has helped me close deals I wouldn't otherwise be able to manage.
Thanks Fundbox!
